_description: Reference file for the A-Mazing Hedge Tileset. Extracted from Unity .unitypackage. Use this to understand tile layout, auto-tiling rules, and how to place hedge tiles correctly.
name: A-Mazing Tileset 1 - Hedge
license: Asset Store package by Flockaroo (published Jan 2021)

tileSize._note: Each tile is 16px wide and 32px tall. The top 16px is the hedge canopy (top-down view). The bottom 16px is the front face (south-facing side). This gives a pseudo-3D top-down perspective. When a tile has a hedge neighbor to the south, the front face is occluded by the neighbor's canopy.

grid._note: Sprites are numbered 0-47, left-to-right then top-to-bottom. Sprite N is at column (N % 8), row (N // 8). Pixel position: x = (N % 8) * 16, y = (N // 8) * 32.

coordinateSystem._note: Neighbor directions use standard cardinal/ordinal compass. N=up, S=down, E=right, W=left. In the auto-tile rules, 'present' means the neighbor cell also contains a hedge tile, 'absent' means it does not.

tiles.name: isolated_single
tiles.description: Isolated single hedge tile. No connecting neighbors. Default fallback sprite.

tiles.name: end_cap_west
tiles.description: West end cap — hedge continues east only. Terminates on the left.

tiles.name: top_edge_se_inner
tiles.description: Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S with SE inner corner filled.

tiles.name: top_right_corner_sw_inner
tiles.description: Top-right outer corner — hedge continues W and S, SW inner corner filled.

tiles.name: top_left_corner_se_inner
tiles.description: Top-left outer corner — hedge continues E and S, SE inner corner filled.

tiles.name: top_edge_both_inners
tiles.description: Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S with both SW and SE inner corners filled.

tiles.name: top_edge_sw_inner
tiles.description: Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S with SW inner corner filled.

tiles.name: end_cap_east
tiles.description: East end cap — hedge continues west only. Terminates on the right.

tiles.name: top_left_corner
tiles.description: Top-left outer corner — hedge continues E and S (no inner corner check).

tiles.name: top_edge_no_inners
tiles.description: Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S but both SE and SW inner corners absent.

tiles.name: cross_ne_only
tiles.description: Center cross — N, S, E, W, NE present; SW, SE, NW absent. Single NE inner corner variant.

tiles.name: center_nw_se_inners
tiles.description: Center — all cardinals + NW, SE present; NE, SW absent.

tiles.name: center_all_except_nw
tiles.description: Center — all directions present except NW. Seven of eight neighbors.

tiles.name: center_all_8
tiles.description: Center — all 8 neighbors present. Fully interior hedge tile.

tiles.name: center_nw_sw_inners
tiles.description: Center — all cardinals + NW, SW present; NE, SE absent.

tiles.name: top_right_corner
tiles.description: Top-right outer corner — hedge continues W and S (no inner corner check).

tiles.name: right_edge_se_inner
tiles.description: Right edge — hedge continues N, S, E with SE inner corner filled.

tiles.name: center_no_inners
tiles.description: Center — all 4 cardinals present but no diagonal inners. Cross without corner smoothing.

tiles.name: center_all_4_no_diag
tiles.description: Center — all 4 cardinals present, no diagonal neighbors. Isolated cross junction.

tiles.name: center_all_except_nw_sw
tiles.description: Center — all except NW and SW. Hedge on N, NE, E, SE, S, W.

tiles.name: center_all_except_se
tiles.description: Center — all except SE. Hedge on N, NE, S, SW, W, NW, E.

tiles.name: center_all_except_sw_se
tiles.description: Center — all except SW and SE. Hedge on N, NE, E, S, W, NW.

tiles.name: right_edge_nw_inner
tiles.description: Right edge — hedge continues N, S, W with NW inner corner present.

tiles.name: end_cap_south
tiles.description: South end cap — hedge continues north only. Terminates at the bottom.

tiles.name: left_edge_ne_inner
tiles.description: Left edge — hedge continues N, S, E with NE inner corner present.

tiles.name: center_all_except_ne_se_sw
tiles.description: Center — all 4 cardinals + NW + SE absent + SW absent. Only NE-like configuration.

tiles.name: right_edge_no_inners
tiles.description: Right edge — hedge continues N, S, W but NW and SW inner corners absent.

tiles.name: left_edge
tiles.description: Left edge — hedge continues N, NE, E, SE, S. All east-side inners filled.

tiles.name: center_all_except_ne
tiles.description: Center — all except NE. Hedge on N, NW, W, SW, S, SE, E.

tiles.name: center_all_except_ne_nw
tiles.description: Center — all except NE and NW. Hedge on N, S, SW, SE, E, W.

tiles.name: right_edge_sw_inner
tiles.description: Right edge — hedge continues N, S, W with SW inner corner present.

tiles.name: end_cap_north
tiles.description: North end cap — hedge continues south only. Terminates at the top.

tiles.name: left_edge_no_inners
tiles.description: Left edge — hedge continues N, S, E but NE and SE inner corners absent.

tiles.name: bottom_edge_no_inners
tiles.description: Bottom edge — hedge continues W, E, N but NE and NW inners absent.

tiles.name: center_all_except_ne_nw_sw
tiles.description: Center — all except NE, NW, SW. Hedge on N, E, SE, S, W.

tiles.name: center_all_except_se_nw
tiles.description: Center — all except SE and NW. Hedge on N, NE, E, S, SW, W.

tiles.name: center_all_except_sw
tiles.description: Center — all except SW. Hedge on N, NW, W, NE, E, SE, S.

tiles.name: sprite_37_unused
tiles.description: Unused sprite (not referenced by any auto-tile rule).

tiles.name: bottom_right_corner
tiles.description: Bottom-right outer corner — hedge continues E and N, NE inner absent.

tiles.name: vertical_straight
tiles.description: Vertical straight — hedge continues N and S only.

tiles.name: bottom_left_corner_ne_absent
tiles.description: Bottom-left outer corner — NE absent variant.

tiles.name: horizontal_straight
tiles.description: Horizontal straight — hedge continues E and W only.

tiles.name: bottom_edge_se_nw_absent
tiles.description: Bottom edge — NE, E present but NW absent variant.

tiles.name: bottom_right_corner_nw
tiles.description: Bottom-right outer corner — hedge continues W, NW, N.

tiles.name: bottom_left_corner_ne
tiles.description: Bottom-left outer corner — hedge continues E, NE, N.

tiles.name: bottom_edge
tiles.description: Bottom edge — hedge continues W, NW, N, NE, E. Full bottom edge.

tiles.name: bottom_edge_ne_absent
tiles.description: Bottom edge — hedge continues W, NW, N, E but NE absent.

tiles.name: bottom_right_corner_basic
tiles.description: Bottom-right outer corner — hedge continues N and W (basic, no inner).

Top-right outer corner — hedge continues W and S, SW inner corner filled.
Top-left outer corner — hedge continues E and S, SE inner corner filled.
Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S with both SW and SE inner corners filled.
Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S with SW inner corner filled.

Top edge — hedge continues W, E, S but both SE and SW inner corners absent.
Center cross — N, S, E, W, NE present; SW, SE, NW absent. Single NE inner corner variant.
Center — all cardinals + NW, SE present; NE, SW absent.
Center — all directions present except NW. Seven of eight neighbors.
Center — all 8 neighbors present. Fully interior hedge tile.
Center — all cardinals + NW, SW present; NE, SE absent.
Top-right outer corner — hedge continues W and S (no inner corner check).
Right edge — hedge continues N, S, E with SE inner corner filled.
Center — all 4 cardinals present but no diagonal inners. Cross without corner smoothing.
Center — all 4 cardinals present, no diagonal neighbors. Isolated cross junction.
Center — all except NW and SW. Hedge on N, NE, E, SE, S, W.
Center — all except SE. Hedge on N, NE, S, SW, W, NW, E.
Center — all except SW and SE. Hedge on N, NE, E, S, W, NW.
Right edge — hedge continues N, S, W with NW inner corner present.
South end cap — hedge continues north only. Terminates at the bottom.
Left edge — hedge continues N, S, E with NE inner corner present.
Center — all 4 cardinals + NW + SE absent + SW absent. Only NE-like configuration.
Right edge — hedge continues N, S, W but NW and SW inner corners absent.

Bottom-left outer corner — NE absent variant.

Bottom-right outer corner — hedge continues W, NW, N.
Bottom-left outer corner — hedge continues E, NE, N.

Bottom edge — hedge continues W, NW, N, E but NE absent.
Bottom-right outer corner — hedge continues N and W (basic, no inner).
Bottom edge — NE inner filled, NW and SE absent variant.

defaultSprite.description: Used when no rule matches. Typically an isolated single hedge tile.

tileCategories._note: Quick lookup by tile function. Sprite indices for each category.

outerCorners._note: Named by which corner of a rectangular hedge shape this tile occupies

edges._note: Named by which edge of a rectangular hedge shape this tile is on

center._note: Interior tiles surrounded on all 4 cardinal sides. Variants differ by which diagonal inner corners are present.

usageGuide.autoTiling: Rules are evaluated in order (ruleId 0 first). First matching rule determines the sprite. If no rule matches, the default sprite (index 0) is used. Each rule specifies required neighbor conditions: True = hedge must be present in that direction, False = hedge must be absent. Directions not mentioned in a rule are 'don't care' (any value).
usageGuide.perspective: Tiles are 16x32 to create a top-down view with visible south-facing front face. The top half (16x16) is the hedge canopy seen from above. The bottom half (16x16) is the front/south-facing wall. Tiles with a hedge neighbor to the south have their front face hidden behind the southern neighbor's canopy.
usageGuide.innerCorners: When building 2D hedge shapes larger than single-width corridors, diagonal neighbors matter. A missing diagonal neighbor between two cardinal neighbors creates a visible 'inner corner' notch. The many center tile variants handle these inner corner combinations for seamless rendering.
usageGuide.forTiledMaps: To use in Tiled: import hedge_tileset.png as a tileset with 16x32 tile size. Either manually place tiles using the categories above, or implement auto-tiling by iterating over each hedge cell and evaluating the rules against its 8 neighbors.
usageGuide.forPhaser: Load as a spritesheet with frameWidth=16, frameHeight=32. Use the autoTileRules to select the correct frame index based on neighbor analysis.
